metadata.title: CVE-2024-7006 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in Libtiff via `tif_dirinfo.c`.This issue may allow an attacker to trigger memory allocation failuresthrough certain means, such as restricting the heap space size or injectingfaults, causing a segmentation fault. This can cause an application crash,eventually leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
gdal package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
